Articles.Content:
can someone make a mod that adds propeller and rotary engine sounds? it is definitely needed, at least until the devs fix the issue themselves. having my prop plane fly around in silence is boring.

 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1912111485

Edited December 29, 2019 by Chris Solomon
added link to my awesome build

issue is confirmed and supposedly they are working on it (as of 2 months ago) but with KSP2 now in the works, who knows if they will ever fix it.

 

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/23179
